metadata.title: CVE-2020-8167 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A CSRF vulnerability exists in rails <= 6.0.3 rails-ujs module that couldallow attackers to send CSRF tokens to wrong domains.

criterions.comment: rails: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
